title: Senior Consultant – Front End Developer – ID
qualified: You will develop front end application with focus on end-user functionality and experience.

You will assist the project teams in delivery of business-driven, technology-enabled solutions to help our clients meet pressing challenges and seize opportunities in their respective markets.
You will work with diverse and talented project team members to solve problems, improve performance, and generate value for our clients across all industries.
You will uphold the firm’s standards and ethos in working with fellow team members and in your interactions with the clients.
You will support business development efforts by contributing directly to the preparation, development of proposals, presentations and publications.

title: Programmer
qualified:
PT. MITRA INFOSARANA was founded in 1992; initially it was a joint venture company between PT. USI Jaya/IBM (local representation of IBM Corporation in Indonesia) and its business partners. It was established as a competency center to support PT. USI Jaya/IBM and its business partners to source non-IBM solution running on IBM platform.
In 1999, MIS became an independent IT company and operated as a System Integrator (SI).
MIS has been recognized as one of the leading IT companies and has won some prestigious awards from its principals/distributors. As a System Integrator, we provide Hardware, Software, Solution Services, System Integration, Network Integration, Outsourcing, Consultancy and Maintenance Services. We have been building a strong partnership with leading solution providers in the market to meet and address customers’ needs and providing world-class solution.
To ensure consistency and to continue improvement on our Product and Service delivery quality, we are implementing ISO 9001 : 2008 Quality System and we have successfully passed the registration audit by an ISO 9001 Certification Body.
